meanings.definition: A place where rabbits are bred or raised.
meanings.sent1: The rabbitries on the farm are filled with fluffy bunnies.
meanings.sent2: We visited the local rabbitries to adopt a pet rabbit.
meanings.sent3: The rabbitries were so busy that the rabbits started a dance party.
meanings.sent4: In the rabbitries, new life hops around every corner.
meanings.sent5: The rabbitries smelled of hay and happiness.

meanings.definition: The act of breeding or raising rabbits.
meanings.sent1: She learned all about rabbitries in her agriculture class.
meanings.sent2: Rabbitries require dedication and hard work to be successful.
meanings.sent3: The rabbitries competition at the fair was fierce but friendly.
meanings.sent4: His love for rabbitries grew with each new litter of bunnies.
meanings.sent5: The rabbitries industry plays a vital role in providing meat and fur.
